channel.title: Fedora 38 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Fedora 38 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Instalación mínima
item.description: Instalación del sistema - metapaquete Minimal 1 {{< column "mt-2 mb-2" >}} 2 <!-- applied margin top and margin bottom modifiers --> 3 {{< /column >}} Picture You want to use darkmode images when darkmode is enabled on a device and a regular image on lightmode? It takes 3 positional parameter Store these images in the static/images directory. Syntax 1... 2{{< picture "lightModeImage.png" "darkModeImage.png" "Image alt text" >}} 3... Result
